2266 iq->dp->name, iq->dp->namelen, iq->qinfo_out.qclass)) {
2267 /* if cache is blacklisted and this zone allows us
2268 * to fallback to the internet, then do so, and
2269 * fetch results from the internet servers */
2270 iq->auth_zone_avoid = 1;
2271 }
2272 }
2273 if(iq->auth_zone_avoid) {
2274 iq->auth_zone_avoid = 0;
2275 auth_fallback = 1;
2276 } else if(auth_zones_lookup(qstate->env->auth_zones, &iq->qinfo_out,
2277 qstate->region, &iq->response, &auth_fallback, iq->dp->name,
2278 iq->dp->namelen)) {
2279 /* use this as a response to be processed by the iterator */
2280 if(verbosity >= VERB_ALGO) {
2281 log_dns_msg("msg from auth zone",
2282 &iq->response->qinfo, iq->response->rep);
2283 }
2284 if((iq->chase_flags&BIT_RD) && !(iq->response->rep->flags&BIT_AA)) {
2285 verbose(VERB_ALGO, "forwarder, ignoring referral from auth zone");
2286 } else {
2287 lock_rw_wrlock(&qstate->env->auth_zones->lock);
2288 qstate->env->auth_zones->num_query_up++;
2289 lock_rw_unlock(&qstate->env->auth_zones->lock);
2290 iq->num_current_queries++;
2291 iq->chase_to_rd = 0;
2292 iq->dnssec_lame_query = 0;
2293 iq->auth_zone_response = 1;
2294 return next_state(iq, QUERY_RESP_STATE);
2295 }
2296 }
2297 iq->auth_zone_response = 0;
2298 if(auth_fallback == 0) {
2299 /* like we got servfail from the auth zone lookup, and
2300 * no internet fallback */
2301 verbose(VERB_ALGO, "auth zone lookup failed, no fallback,"
2302 " servfail");
2303 errinf(qstate, "auth zone lookup failed, fallback is off");
2304 return error_response(qstate, id, LDNS_RCODE_SERVFAIL);
2305 }
2306 if(iq->dp->auth_dp) {
2307 /* we wanted to fallback, but had no delegpt, only the
2308 * auth zone generated delegpt, create an actual one */
2309 iq->auth_zone_avoid = 1;
2310 return next_state(iq, INIT_REQUEST_STATE);
2311 }
2312 /* but mostly, fallback==1 (like, when no such auth zone exists)
2313 * and we continue with lookups */
2314
2315 tf_policy = 0;
2316 /* < not <=, because although the array is large enough for <=, the
2317 * generated query will immediately be discarded due to depth and
2318 * that servfail is cached, which is not good as opportunism goes. */
2319 if(iq->depth < ie->max_dependency_depth
2320 && iq->sent_count < TARGET_FETCH_STOP) {
2321 tf_policy = ie->target_fetch_policy[iq->depth];
2322 }
2323
2324 /* if in 0x20 fallback get as many targets as possible */
2325 if(iq->caps_fallback) {
2326 int extra = 0;
2327 size_t naddr, nres, navail;
2328 if(!query_for_targets(qstate, iq, ie, id, -1, &extra)) {
2329 errinf(qstate, "could not fetch nameservers for 0x20 fallback");
2330 return error_response(qstate, id, LDNS_RCODE_SERVFAIL);
2331 }
2332 iq->num_target_queries += extra;
2333 target_count_increase(iq, extra);
2334 if(iq->num_target_queries > 0) {
2335 /* wait to get all targets, we want to try em */
2336 verbose(VERB_ALGO, "wait for all targets for fallback");
2337 qstate->ext_state[id] = module_wait_reply;
2338 /* undo qname minimise step because we'll get back here
2339 * to do it again */
2340 if(qout_orig && iq->minimise_count > 0) {
2341 iq->minimise_count--;
2342 iq->qinfo_out.qname = qout_orig;
2343 iq->qinfo_out.qname_len = qout_orig_len;
2344 }
2345 return 0;
2346 }
2347 /* did we do enough fallback queries already? */
2348 delegpt_count_addr(iq->dp, &naddr, &nres, &navail);
2349 /* the current caps_server is the number of fallbacks sent.
2350 * the original query is one that matched too, so we have
2351 * caps_server+1 number of matching queries now */
2352 if(iq->caps_server+1 >= naddr*3 ||
2353 iq->caps_server*2+2 >= MAX_SENT_COUNT) {
2354 /* *2 on sentcount check because ipv6 may fail */
2355 /* we're done, process the response */
2356 verbose(VERB_ALGO, "0x20 fallback had %d responses "
2357 "match for %d wanted, done.",
2358 (int)iq->caps_server+1, (int)naddr*3);
2359 iq->response = iq->caps_response;
2360 iq->caps_fallback = 0;
2361 iter_dec_attempts(iq->dp, 3); /* space for fallback */
2362 iq->num_current_queries++; /* RespState decrements it*/
2363 iq->referral_count++; /* make sure we don't loop */
2364 iq->sent_count = 0;
2365 iq->state = QUERY_RESP_STATE;
2366 return 1;
2367 }
2368 verbose(VERB_ALGO, "0x20 fallback number %d",
2369 (int)iq->caps_server);
2370
2371 /* if there is a policy to fetch missing targets
2372 * opportunistically, do it. we rely on the fact that once a
2373 * query (or queries) for a missing name have been issued,
2374 * they will not show up again. */
2375 } else if(tf_policy != 0) {
2376 int extra = 0;
2377 verbose(VERB_ALGO, "attempt to get extra %d targets",
2378 tf_policy);
2379 (void)query_for_targets(qstate, iq, ie, id, tf_policy, &extra);
2380 /* errors ignored, these targets are not strictly necessary for
2381 * this result, we do not have to reply with SERVFAIL */
2382 iq->num_target_queries += extra;
2383 target_count_increase(iq, extra);
2384 }
2385
2386 /* Add the current set of unused targets to our queue. */
2387 delegpt_add_unused_targets(iq->dp);
2388
2389 /* Select the next usable target, filtering out unsuitable targets. */
2390 target = iter_server_selection(ie, qstate->env, iq->dp,
2391 iq->dp->name, iq->dp->namelen, iq->qchase.qtype,
2392 &iq->dnssec_lame_query, &iq->chase_to_rd,
2393 iq->num_target_queries, qstate->blacklist,
2394 qstate->prefetch_leeway);
2395
2396 /* If no usable target was selected... */
2397 if(!target) {
2398 /* Here we distinguish between three states: generate a new
2399 * target query, just wait, or quit (with a SERVFAIL).
2400 * We have the following information: number of active
2401 * target queries, number of active current queries,
2402 * the presence of missing targets at this delegation
2403 * point, and the given query target policy. */
2404
2405 /* Check for the wait condition. If this is true, then
2406 * an action must be taken. */
2407 if(iq->num_target_queries==0 && iq->num_current_queries==0) {
2408 /* If there is nothing to wait for, then we need
2409 * to distinguish between generating (a) new target
2410 * query, or failing. */
2411 if(delegpt_count_missing_targets(iq->dp) > 0) {
2412 int qs = 0;
2413 verbose(VERB_ALGO, "querying for next "
2414 "missing target");
2415 if(!query_for_targets(qstate, iq, ie, id,
2416 1, &qs)) {
2417 errinf(qstate, "could not fetch nameserver");
2418 errinf_dname(qstate, "at zone", iq->dp->name);
2419 return error_response(qstate, id,
2420 LDNS_RCODE_SERVFAIL);
2421 }
2422 if(qs == 0 &&
2423 delegpt_count_missing_targets(iq->dp) == 0){
2424 /* it looked like there were missing
2425 * targets, but they did not turn up.
2426 * Try the bad choices again (if any),
2427 * when we get back here missing==0,
2428 * so this is not a loop. */
2429 return 1;
2430 }
2431 iq->num_target_queries += qs;
2432 target_count_increase(iq, qs);
2433 }
2434 /* Since a target query might have been made, we
2435 * need to check again. */
2436 if(iq->num_target_queries == 0) {
2437 /* if in capsforid fallback, instead of last
2438 * resort, we agree with the current reply
2439 * we have (if any) (our count of addrs bad)*/
2440 if(iq->caps_fallback && iq->caps_reply) {
2441 /* we're done, process the response */
2442 verbose(VERB_ALGO, "0x20 fallback had %d responses, "
2443 "but no more servers except "
2444 "last resort, done.",
2445 (int)iq->caps_server+1);
2446 iq->response = iq->caps_response;
2447 iq->caps_fallback = 0;
2448 iter_dec_attempts(iq->dp, 3); /* space for fallback */
2449 iq->num_current_queries++; /* RespState decrements it*/
2450 iq->referral_count++; /* make sure we don't loop */
2451 iq->sent_count = 0;
2452 iq->state = QUERY_RESP_STATE;
2453 return 1;
2454 }
2455 return processLastResort(qstate, iq, ie, id);
2456 }
2457 }
2458
2459 /* otherwise, we have no current targets, so submerge
2460 * until one of the target or direct queries return. */
2461 if(iq->num_target_queries>0 && iq->num_current_queries>0) {
2462 verbose(VERB_ALGO, "no current targets -- waiting "
2463 "for %d targets to resolve or %d outstanding"
2464 " queries to respond", iq->num_target_queries,
2465 iq->num_current_queries);
2466 qstate->ext_state[id] = module_wait_reply;
2467 } else if(iq->num_target_queries>0) {
2468 verbose(VERB_ALGO, "no current targets -- waiting "
2469 "for %d targets to resolve.",
2470 iq->num_target_queries);
2471 qstate->ext_state[id] = module_wait_subquery;
2472 } else {
2473 verbose(VERB_ALGO, "no current targets -- waiting "
2474 "for %d outstanding queries to respond.",
2475 iq->num_current_queries);
2476 qstate->ext_state[id] = module_wait_reply;
2477 }
2478 /* undo qname minimise step because we'll get back here
2479 * to do it again */
2480 if(qout_orig && iq->minimise_count > 0) {
2481 iq->minimise_count--;
2482 iq->qinfo_out.qname = qout_orig;
2483 iq->qinfo_out.qname_len = qout_orig_len;
2484 }
2485 return 0;
2486 }
2487
2488 /* if not forwarding, check ratelimits per delegationpoint name */
2489 if(!(iq->chase_flags & BIT_RD) && !iq->ratelimit_ok) {
2490 if(!infra_ratelimit_inc(qstate->env->infra_cache, iq->dp->name,
2491 iq->dp->namelen, *qstate->env->now, &qstate->qinfo,
2492 qstate->reply)) {
2493 lock_basic_lock(&ie->queries_ratelimit_lock);
2494 ie->num_queries_ratelimited++;
2495 lock_basic_unlock(&ie->queries_ratelimit_lock);
2496 verbose(VERB_ALGO, "query exceeded ratelimits");
2497 qstate->was_ratelimited = 1;
2498 errinf_dname(qstate, "exceeded ratelimit for zone",
2499 iq->dp->name);
2500 return error_response(qstate, id, LDNS_RCODE_SERVFAIL);
2501 }
2502 }
2503
2504 /* We have a valid target. */
2505 if(verbosity >= VERB_QUERY) {
2506 log_query_info(VERB_QUERY, "sending query:", &iq->qinfo_out);
2507 log_name_addr(VERB_QUERY, "sending to target:", iq->dp->name,
2508 &target->addr, target->addrlen);
2509 verbose(VERB_ALGO, "dnssec status: %s%s",
2510 iq->dnssec_expected?"expected": "not expected",
2511 iq->dnssec_lame_query?" but lame_query anyway": "");
2512 }
2513 fptr_ok(fptr_whitelist_modenv_send_query(qstate->env->send_query));
2514 outq = (*qstate->env->send_query)(&iq->qinfo_out,
2515 iq->chase_flags | (iq->chase_to_rd?BIT_RD:0),
2516 /* unset CD if to forwarder(RD set) and not dnssec retry
2517 * (blacklist nonempty) and no trust-anchors are configured
2518 * above the qname or on the first attempt when dnssec is on */
2519 EDNS_DO| ((iq->chase_to_rd||(iq->chase_flags&BIT_RD)!=0)&&
2520 !qstate->blacklist&&(!iter_qname_indicates_dnssec(qstate->env,
2521 &iq->qinfo_out)||target->attempts==1)?0:BIT_CD),
2522 iq->dnssec_expected, iq->caps_fallback || is_caps_whitelisted(
2523 ie, iq), &target->addr, target->addrlen,
2524 iq->dp->name, iq->dp->namelen,
2525 (iq->dp->ssl_upstream || qstate->env->cfg->ssl_upstream),
2526 target->tls_auth_name, qstate);
2527 if(!outq) {
2528 log_addr(VERB_DETAIL, "error sending query to auth server",
2529 &target->addr, target->addrlen);
2530 if(!(iq->chase_flags & BIT_RD) && !iq->ratelimit_ok)
2531 infra_ratelimit_dec(qstate->env->infra_cache, iq->dp->name,
2532 iq->dp->namelen, *qstate->env->now);
2533 if(qstate->env->cfg->qname_minimisation)
2534 iq->minimisation_state = SKIP_MINIMISE_STATE;
2535 return next_state(iq, QUERYTARGETS_STATE);
2536 }
2537 outbound_list_insert(&iq->outlist, outq);
2538 iq->num_current_queries++;
2539 iq->sent_count++;
2540 qstate->ext_state[id] = module_wait_reply;
2541
2542 return 0;
2543}
2544
2545/** find NS rrset in given list */
2546static struct ub_packed_rrset_key*
2547find_NS(struct reply_info* rep, size_t from, size_t to)
2548{
2549 size_t i;
2550 for(i=from; i<to; i++) {
2551 if(ntohs(rep->rrsets[i]->rk.type) == LDNS_RR_TYPE_NS)
2552 return rep->rrsets[i];
2553 }
2554 return NULL;
2555}
2556
2557
2558/**
2559 * Process the query response. All queries end up at this state first. This
2560 * process generally consists of analyzing the response and routing the
2561 * event to the next state (either bouncing it back to a request state, or
2562 * terminating the processing for this event).
2563 *
2564 * @param qstate: query state.
2565 * @param iq: iterator query state.
2566 * @param id: module id.
2567 * @return true if the event requires more immediate processing, false if
2568 * not. This is generally only true when forwarding the request to
2569 * the final state (i.e., on answer).
2570 */
2571static int
2572processQueryResponse(struct module_qstate* qstate, struct iter_qstate* iq,
2573 int id)
2574{
2575 int dnsseclame = 0;
2576 enum response_type type;
2577 iq->num_current_queries--;
2578
2579 if(!inplace_cb_query_response_call(qstate->env, qstate, iq->response))
2580 log_err("unable to call query_response callback");
2581
2582 if(iq->response == NULL) {
2583 /* Don't increment qname when QNAME minimisation is enabled */
2584 if(qstate->env->cfg->qname_minimisation) {
2585 iq->minimise_timeout_count++;
2586 iq->minimisation_state = SKIP_MINIMISE_STATE;
2587 }
2588 iq->chase_to_rd = 0;
2589 iq->dnssec_lame_query = 0;
2590 verbose(VERB_ALGO, "query response was timeout");
2591 return next_state(iq, QUERYTARGETS_STATE);
2592 }
2593 type = response_type_from_server(
2594 (int)((iq->chase_flags&BIT_RD) || iq->chase_to_rd),
2595 iq->response, &iq->qinfo_out, iq->dp);
2596 iq->chase_to_rd = 0;
2597 if(type == RESPONSE_TYPE_REFERRAL && (iq->chase_flags&BIT_RD) &&
2598 !iq->auth_zone_response) {
2599 /* When forwarding (RD bit is set), we handle referrals
2600 * differently. No queries should be sent elsewhere */
2601 type = RESPONSE_TYPE_ANSWER;
2602 }
2603 if(!qstate->env->cfg->disable_dnssec_lame_check && iq->dnssec_expected
2604 && !iq->dnssec_lame_query &&
2605 !(iq->chase_flags&BIT_RD)
2606 && iq->sent_count < DNSSEC_LAME_DETECT_COUNT
2607 && type != RESPONSE_TYPE_LAME
2608 && type != RESPONSE_TYPE_REC_LAME
2609 && type != RESPONSE_TYPE_THROWAWAY
2610 && type != RESPONSE_TYPE_UNTYPED) {
2611 /* a possible answer, see if it is missing DNSSEC */
2612 /* but not when forwarding, so we dont mark fwder lame */
2613 if(!iter_msg_has_dnssec(iq->response)) {
2614 /* Mark this address as dnsseclame in this dp,
2615 * because that will make serverselection disprefer
2616 * it, but also, once it is the only final option,
2617 * use dnssec-lame-bypass if it needs to query there.*/
2618 if(qstate->reply) {
2619 struct delegpt_addr* a = delegpt_find_addr(
2620 iq->dp, &qstate->reply->addr,
2621 qstate->reply->addrlen);
2622 if(a) a->dnsseclame = 1;
2623 }
2624 /* test the answer is from the zone we expected,
2625 * otherwise, (due to parent,child on same server), we
2626 * might mark the server,zone lame inappropriately */
2627 if(!iter_msg_from_zone(iq->response, iq->dp, type,
2628 iq->qchase.qclass))
2629 qstate->reply = NULL;
2630 type = RESPONSE_TYPE_LAME;
2631 dnsseclame = 1;
2632 }
2633 } else iq->dnssec_lame_query = 0;
2634 /* see if referral brings us close to the target */
2635 if(type == RESPONSE_TYPE_REFERRAL) {
2636 struct ub_packed_rrset_key* ns = find_NS(
2637 iq->response->rep, iq->response->rep->an_numrrsets,
2638 iq->response->rep->an_numrrsets
2639 + iq->response->rep->ns_numrrsets);
2640 if(!ns) ns = find_NS(iq->response->rep, 0,
2641 iq->response->rep->an_numrrsets);
2642 if(!ns || !dname_strict_subdomain_c(ns->rk.dname, iq->dp->name)
2643 || !dname_subdomain_c(iq->qchase.qname, ns->rk.dname)){
2644 verbose(VERB_ALGO, "bad referral, throwaway");
2645 type = RESPONSE_TYPE_THROWAWAY;
2646 } else
2647 iter_scrub_ds(iq->response, ns, iq->dp->name);
2648 } else iter_scrub_ds(iq->response, NULL, NULL);
2649 if(type == RESPONSE_TYPE_THROWAWAY &&
2650 FLAGS_GET_RCODE(iq->response->rep->flags) == LDNS_RCODE_YXDOMAIN) {
2651 /* YXDOMAIN is a permanent error, no need to retry */
2652 type = RESPONSE_TYPE_ANSWER;
2653 }
2654 if(type == RESPONSE_TYPE_CNAME && iq->response->rep->an_numrrsets >= 1
2655 && ntohs(iq->response->rep->rrsets[0]->rk.type) == LDNS_RR_TYPE_DNAME) {
2656 uint8_t* sname = NULL;
2657 size_t snamelen = 0;
2658 get_cname_target(iq->response->rep->rrsets[0], &sname,
2659 &snamelen);
2660 if(snamelen && dname_subdomain_c(sname, iq->response->rep->rrsets[0]->rk.dname)) {
2661 /* DNAME to a subdomain loop; do not recurse */
2662 type = RESPONSE_TYPE_ANSWER;
2663 }
2664 } else if(type == RESPONSE_TYPE_CNAME &&
2665 iq->qchase.qtype == LDNS_RR_TYPE_CNAME &&
2666 iq->minimisation_state == MINIMISE_STATE &&
2667 query_dname_compare(iq->qchase.qname, iq->qinfo_out.qname) == 0) {
2668 /* The minimised query for full QTYPE and hidden QTYPE can be
2669 * classified as CNAME response type, even when the original
2670 * QTYPE=CNAME. This should be treated as answer response type.
2671 */
2672 type = RESPONSE_TYPE_ANSWER;
2673 }
2674
2675 /* handle each of the type cases */
2676 if(type == RESPONSE_TYPE_ANSWER) {
2677 /* ANSWER type responses terminate the query algorithm,
2678 * so they sent on their */
2679 if(verbosity >= VERB_DETAIL) {
2680 verbose(VERB_DETAIL, "query response was %s",
2681 FLAGS_GET_RCODE(iq->response->rep->flags)
2682 ==LDNS_RCODE_NXDOMAIN?"NXDOMAIN ANSWER":
2683 (iq->response->rep->an_numrrsets?"ANSWER":
2684 "nodata ANSWER"));
2685 }
2686 /* if qtype is DS, check we have the right level of answer,
2687 * like grandchild answer but we need the middle, reject it */
2688 if(iq->qchase.qtype == LDNS_RR_TYPE_DS && !iq->dsns_point
2689 && !(iq->chase_flags&BIT_RD)
2690 && iter_ds_toolow(iq->response, iq->dp)
2691 && iter_dp_cangodown(&iq->qchase, iq->dp)) {
2692 /* close down outstanding requests to be discarded */
2693 outbound_list_clear(&iq->outlist);
2694 iq->num_current_queries = 0;
2695 fptr_ok(fptr_whitelist_modenv_detach_subs(
2696 qstate->env->detach_subs));
2697 (*qstate->env->detach_subs)(qstate);
2698 iq->num_target_queries = 0;
2699 return processDSNSFind(qstate, iq, id);
2700 }
2701 if(!qstate->no_cache_store)
2702 iter_dns_store(qstate->env, &iq->response->qinfo,
2703 iq->response->rep, 0, qstate->prefetch_leeway,
2704 iq->dp&&iq->dp->has_parent_side_NS,
2705 qstate->region, qstate->query_flags);
2706 /* close down outstanding requests to be discarded */
2707 outbound_list_clear(&iq->outlist);
2708 iq->num_current_queries = 0;
2709 fptr_ok(fptr_whitelist_modenv_detach_subs(
2710 qstate->env->detach_subs));
2711 (*qstate->env->detach_subs)(qstate);
2712 iq->num_target_queries = 0;
2713 if(qstate->reply)
2714 sock_list_insert(&qstate->reply_origin,
2715 &qstate->reply->addr, qstate->reply->addrlen,
2716 qstate->region);
2717 if(iq->minimisation_state != DONOT_MINIMISE_STATE
2718 && !(iq->chase_flags & BIT_RD)) {
2719 if(FLAGS_GET_RCODE(iq->response->rep->flags) !=
2720 LDNS_RCODE_NOERROR) {
2721 if(qstate->env->cfg->qname_minimisation_strict)
2722 return final_state(iq);
2723 /* Best effort qname-minimisation.
2724 * Stop minimising and send full query when
2725 * RCODE is not NOERROR. */
2726 iq->minimisation_state = DONOT_MINIMISE_STATE;
2727 }
2728 if(FLAGS_GET_RCODE(iq->response->rep->flags) ==
2729 LDNS_RCODE_NXDOMAIN) {
2730 /* Stop resolving when NXDOMAIN is DNSSEC
2731 * signed. Based on assumption that nameservers
2732 * serving signed zones do not return NXDOMAIN
2733 * for empty-non-terminals. */
2734 if(iq->dnssec_expected)
2735 return final_state(iq);
2736 /* Make subrequest to validate intermediate
2737 * NXDOMAIN if harden-below-nxdomain is
2738 * enabled. */
2739 if(qstate->env->cfg->harden_below_nxdomain) {
2740 struct module_qstate* subq = NULL;
2741 log_query_info(VERB_QUERY,
2742 "schedule NXDOMAIN validation:",
2743 &iq->response->qinfo);
2744 if(!generate_sub_request(
2745 iq->response->qinfo.qname,
2746 iq->response->qinfo.qname_len,
2747 iq->response->qinfo.qtype,
2748 iq->response->qinfo.qclass,
2749 qstate, id, iq,
2750 INIT_REQUEST_STATE,
2751 FINISHED_STATE, &subq, 1))
2752 verbose(VERB_ALGO,
2753 "could not validate NXDOMAIN "
2754 "response");
2755 outbound_list_clear(&iq->outlist);
2756 iq->num_current_queries = 0;
2757 fptr_ok(fptr_whitelist_modenv_detach_subs(
2758 qstate->env->detach_subs));
2759 (*qstate->env->detach_subs)(qstate);
2760 iq->num_target_queries = 0;
2761 }
2762 }
2763 return next_state(iq, QUERYTARGETS_STATE);
2764 }
2765 return final_state(iq);
2766 } else if(type == RESPONSE_TYPE_REFERRAL) {
2767 /* REFERRAL type responses get a reset of the
2768 * delegation point, and back to the QUERYTARGETS_STATE. */
2769 verbose(VERB_DETAIL, "query response was REFERRAL");
2770
2771 if(!(iq->chase_flags & BIT_RD) && !iq->ratelimit_ok) {
2772 /* we have a referral, no ratelimit, we can send
2773 * our queries to the given name */
2774 infra_ratelimit_dec(qstate->env->infra_cache,
2775 iq->dp->name, iq->dp->namelen,
2776 *qstate->env->now);
2777 }
2778
2779 /* if hardened, only store referral if we asked for it */
2780 if(!qstate->no_cache_store &&
2781 (!qstate->env->cfg->harden_referral_path ||
2782 ( qstate->qinfo.qtype == LDNS_RR_TYPE_NS
2783 && (qstate->query_flags&BIT_RD)
2784 && !(qstate->query_flags&BIT_CD)
2785 /* we know that all other NS rrsets are scrubbed
2786 * away, thus on referral only one is left.
2787 * see if that equals the query name... */
2788 && ( /* auth section, but sometimes in answer section*/
2789 reply_find_rrset_section_ns(iq->response->rep,
2790 iq->qchase.qname, iq->qchase.qname_len,
2791 LDNS_RR_TYPE_NS, iq->qchase.qclass)
2792 || reply_find_rrset_section_an(iq->response->rep,
2793 iq->qchase.qname, iq->qchase.qname_len,
2794 LDNS_RR_TYPE_NS, iq->qchase.qclass)
2795 )
2796 ))) {
2797 /* Store the referral under the current query */
2798 /* no prefetch-leeway, since its not the answer */
2799 iter_dns_store(qstate->env, &iq->response->qinfo,
2800 iq->response->rep, 1, 0, 0, NULL, 0);
2801 if(iq->store_parent_NS)
2802 iter_store_parentside_NS(qstate->env,
2803 iq->response->rep);
2804 if(qstate->env->neg_cache)
2805 val_neg_addreferral(qstate->env->neg_cache,
2806 iq->response->rep, iq->dp->name);
2807 }
2808 /* store parent-side-in-zone-glue, if directly queried for */
2809 if(!qstate->no_cache_store && iq->query_for_pside_glue
2810 && !iq->pside_glue) {
2811 iq->pside_glue = reply_find_rrset(iq->response->rep,
2812 iq->qchase.qname, iq->qchase.qname_len,
2813 iq->qchase.qtype, iq->qchase.qclass);
2814 if(iq->pside_glue) {
2815 log_rrset_key(VERB_ALGO, "found parent-side "
2816 "glue", iq->pside_glue);
2817 iter_store_parentside_rrset(qstate->env,
2818 iq->pside_glue);
2819 }
2820 }
2821
2822 /* Reset the event state, setting the current delegation
2823 * point to the referral. */
2824 iq->deleg_msg = iq->response;
2825 iq->dp = delegpt_from_message(iq->response, qstate->region);
2826 if (qstate->env->cfg->qname_minimisation)
2827 iq->minimisation_state = INIT_MINIMISE_STATE;
2828 if(!iq->dp) {
2829 errinf(qstate, "malloc failure, for delegation point");
2830 return error_response(qstate, id, LDNS_RCODE_SERVFAIL);
2831 }
2832 if(!cache_fill_missing(qstate->env, iq->qchase.qclass,
2833 qstate->region, iq->dp)) {
2834 errinf(qstate, "malloc failure, copy extra info into delegation point");
2835 return error_response(qstate, id, LDNS_RCODE_SERVFAIL);
2836 }
2837 if(iq->store_parent_NS && query_dname_compare(iq->dp->name,
2838 iq->store_parent_NS->name) == 0)
2839 iter_merge_retry_counts(iq->dp, iq->store_parent_NS);
2840 delegpt_log(VERB_ALGO, iq->dp);
2841 /* Count this as a referral. */
2842 iq->referral_count++;
2843 iq->sent_count = 0;
2844 /* see if the next dp is a trust anchor, or a DS was sent
2845 * along, indicating dnssec is expected for next zone */
2846 iq->dnssec_expected = iter_indicates_dnssec(qstate->env,
2847 iq->dp, iq->response, iq->qchase.qclass);
2848 /* if dnssec, validating then also fetch the key for the DS */
2849 if(iq->dnssec_expected && qstate->env->cfg->prefetch_key &&
2850 !(qstate->query_flags&BIT_CD))
2851 generate_dnskey_prefetch(qstate, iq, id);
2852
2853 /* spawn off NS and addr to auth servers for the NS we just
2854 * got in the referral. This gets authoritative answer
2855 * (answer section trust level) rrset.
2856 * right after, we detach the subs, answer goes to cache. */
2857 if(qstate->env->cfg->harden_referral_path)
2858 generate_ns_check(qstate, iq, id);
2859
2860 /* stop current outstanding queries.
2861 * FIXME: should the outstanding queries be waited for and
2862 * handled? Say by a subquery that inherits the outbound_entry.
2863 */
2864 outbound_list_clear(&iq->outlist);
2865 iq->num_current_queries = 0;
2866 fptr_ok(fptr_whitelist_modenv_detach_subs(
2867 qstate->env->detach_subs));
2868 (*qstate->env->detach_subs)(qstate);
2869 iq->num_target_queries = 0;
2870 verbose(VERB_ALGO, "cleared outbound list for next round");
2871 return next_state(iq, QUERYTARGETS_STATE);
2872 } else if(type == RESPONSE_TYPE_CNAME) {
2873 uint8_t* sname = NULL;
2874 size_t snamelen = 0;
2875 /* CNAME type responses get a query restart (i.e., get a
2876 * reset of the query state and go back to INIT_REQUEST_STATE).
2877 */
2878 verbose(VERB_DETAIL, "query response was CNAME");
2879 if(verbosity >= VERB_ALGO)
2880 log_dns_msg("cname msg", &iq->response->qinfo,
2881 iq->response->rep);
2882 /* if qtype is DS, check we have the right level of answer,
2883 * like grandchild answer but we need the middle, reject it */
2884 if(iq->qchase.qtype == LDNS_RR_TYPE_DS && !iq->dsns_point
2885 && !(iq->chase_flags&BIT_RD)
2886 && iter_ds_toolow(iq->response, iq->dp)
2887 && iter_dp_cangodown(&iq->qchase, iq->dp)) {
2888 outbound_list_clear(&iq->outlist);
2889 iq->num_current_queries = 0;
2890 fptr_ok(fptr_whitelist_modenv_detach_subs(
2891 qstate->env->detach_subs));
2892 (*qstate->env->detach_subs)(qstate);
2893 iq->num_target_queries = 0;
2894 return processDSNSFind(qstate, iq, id);
2895 }
2896 /* Process the CNAME response. */
2897 if(!handle_cname_response(qstate, iq, iq->response,
2898 &sname, &snamelen)) {
2899 errinf(qstate, "malloc failure, CNAME info");
2900 return error_response(qstate, id, LDNS_RCODE_SERVFAIL);
2901 }
2902 /* cache the CNAME response under the current query */
2903 /* NOTE : set referral=1, so that rrsets get stored but not
2904 * the partial query answer (CNAME only). */
2905 /* prefetchleeway applied because this updates answer parts */
2906 if(!qstate->no_cache_store)
2907 iter_dns_store(qstate->env, &iq->response->qinfo,
2908 iq->response->rep, 1, qstate->prefetch_leeway,
2909 iq->dp&&iq->dp->has_parent_side_NS, NULL,
2910 qstate->query_flags);
2911 /* set the current request's qname to the new value. */
2912 iq->qchase.qname = sname;
2913 iq->qchase.qname_len = snamelen;
2914 /* Clear the query state, since this is a query restart. */
2915 iq->deleg_msg = NULL;
2916 iq->dp = NULL;
2917 iq->dsns_point = NULL;
2918 iq->auth_zone_response = 0;
2919 iq->sent_count = 0;
2920 if(iq->minimisation_state != MINIMISE_STATE)
2921 /* Only count as query restart when it is not an extra
2922 * query as result of qname minimisation. */
2923 iq->query_restart_count++;
2924 if(qstate->env->cfg->qname_minimisation)
2925 iq->minimisation_state = INIT_MINIMISE_STATE;
2926
2927 /* stop current outstanding queries.
2928 * FIXME: should the outstanding queries be waited for and
2929 * handled? Say by a subquery that inherits the outbound_entry.
2930 */
2931 outbound_list_clear(&iq->outlist);
2932 iq->num_current_queries = 0;
2933 fptr_ok(fptr_whitelist_modenv_detach_subs(
2934 qstate->env->detach_subs));
2935 (*qstate->env->detach_subs)(qstate);
2936 iq->num_target_queries = 0;
2937 if(qstate->reply)
2938 sock_list_insert(&qstate->reply_origin,
2939 &qstate->reply->addr, qstate->reply->addrlen,
2940 qstate->region);
2941 verbose(VERB_ALGO, "cleared outbound list for query restart");
2942 /* go to INIT_REQUEST_STATE for new qname. */
2943 return next_state(iq, INIT_REQUEST_STATE);
2944 } else if(type == RESPONSE_TYPE_LAME) {
2945 /* Cache the LAMEness. */
2946 verbose(VERB_DETAIL, "query response was %sLAME",
2947 dnsseclame?"DNSSEC ":"");
2948 if(!dname_subdomain_c(iq->qchase.qname, iq->dp->name)) {
2949 log_err("mark lame: mismatch in qname and dpname");
2950 /* throwaway this reply below */
2951 } else if(qstate->reply) {
2952 /* need addr for lameness cache, but we may have
2953 * gotten this from cache, so test to be sure */
2954 if(!infra_set_lame(qstate->env->infra_cache,
2955 &qstate->reply->addr, qstate->reply->addrlen,
2956 iq->dp->name, iq->dp->namelen,
2957 *qstate->env->now, dnsseclame, 0,
2958 iq->qchase.qtype))
2959 log_err("mark host lame: out of memory");
2960 }
2961 } else if(type == RESPONSE_TYPE_REC_LAME) {
2962 /* Cache the LAMEness. */
2963 verbose(VERB_DETAIL, "query response REC_LAME: "
2964 "recursive but not authoritative server");
2965 if(!dname_subdomain_c(iq->qchase.qname, iq->dp->name)) {
2966 log_err("mark rec_lame: mismatch in qname and dpname");
2967 /* throwaway this reply below */
2968 } else if(qstate->reply) {
2969 /* need addr for lameness cache, but we may have
2970 * gotten this from cache, so test to be sure */
2971 verbose(VERB_DETAIL, "mark as REC_LAME");
2972 if(!infra_set_lame(qstate->env->infra_cache,
2973 &qstate->reply->addr, qstate->reply->addrlen,
2974 iq->dp->name, iq->dp->namelen,
2975 *qstate->env->now, 0, 1, iq->qchase.qtype))
2976 log_err("mark host lame: out of memory");
2977 }
2978 } else if(type == RESPONSE_TYPE_THROWAWAY) {
2979 /* LAME and THROWAWAY responses are handled the same way.
2980 * In this case, the event is just sent directly back to
2981 * the QUERYTARGETS_STATE without resetting anything,
2982 * because, clearly, the next target must be tried. */
2983 verbose(VERB_DETAIL, "query response was THROWAWAY");
2984 } else {
2985 log_warn("A query response came back with an unknown type: %d",
2986 (int)type);
2987 }
2988
2989 /* LAME, THROWAWAY and "unknown" all end up here.
2990 * Recycle to the QUERYTARGETS state to hopefully try a
2991 * different target. */
2992 if (qstate->env->cfg->qname_minimisation &&
2993 !qstate->env->cfg->qname_minimisation_strict)
2994 iq->minimisation_state = DONOT_MINIMISE_STATE;
2995 if(iq->auth_zone_response) {
2996 /* can we fallback? */
2997 iq->auth_zone_response = 0;
2998 if(!auth_zones_can_fallback(qstate->env->auth_zones,
2999 iq->dp->name, iq->dp->namelen, qstate->qinfo.qclass)) {
3000 verbose(VERB_ALGO, "auth zone response bad, and no"
3001 " fallback possible, servfail");
3002 errinf_dname(qstate, "response is bad, no fallback, "
3003 "for auth zone", iq->dp->name);
3004 return error_response(qstate, id, LDNS_RCODE_SERVFAIL);
3005 }
3006 verbose(VERB_ALGO, "auth zone response was bad, "
3007 "fallback enabled");
3008 iq->auth_zone_avoid = 1;
3009 if(iq->dp->auth_dp) {
3010 /* we are using a dp for the auth zone, with no
3011 * nameservers, get one first */
3012 iq->dp = NULL;
3013 return next_state(iq, INIT_REQUEST_STATE);
3014 }
3015 }
3016 return next_state(iq, QUERYTARGETS_STATE);
3017}
3018
3019/**
3020 * Return priming query results to interested super querystates.
3021 *
3022 * Sets the delegation point and delegation message (not nonRD queries).
3023 * This is a callback from walk_supers.
3024 *
3025 * @param qstate: priming query state that finished.
3026 * @param id: module id.
3027 * @param forq: the qstate for which priming has been done.
3028 */
3029static void
3030prime_supers(struct module_qstate* qstate, int id, struct module_qstate* forq)
3031{
3032 struct iter_qstate* foriq = (struct iter_qstate*)forq->minfo[id];
3033 struct delegpt* dp = NULL;
3034
3035 log_assert(qstate->is_priming || foriq->wait_priming_stub);
3036 log_assert(qstate->return_rcode == LDNS_RCODE_NOERROR);
3037 /* Convert our response to a delegation point */
3038 dp = delegpt_from_message(qstate->return_msg, forq->region);
3039 if(!dp) {
3040 /* if there is no convertable delegation point, then
3041 * the ANSWER type was (presumably) a negative answer. */
3042 verbose(VERB_ALGO, "prime response was not a positive "
3043 "ANSWER; failing");
3044 foriq->dp = NULL;
3045 foriq->state = QUERYTARGETS_STATE;
3046 return;
3047 }
3048
3049 log_query_info(VERB_DETAIL, "priming successful for", &qstate->qinfo);
3050 delegpt_log(VERB_ALGO, dp);
3051 foriq->dp = dp;
3052 foriq->deleg_msg = dns_copy_msg(qstate->return_msg, forq->region);
3053 if(!foriq->deleg_msg) {
3054 log_err("copy prime response: out of memory");
3055 foriq->dp = NULL;
3056 foriq->state = QUERYTARGETS_STATE;
3057 return;
3058 }
3059
3060 /* root priming responses go to init stage 2, priming stub
3061 * responses to to stage 3. */
3062 if(foriq->wait_priming_stub) {
3063 foriq->state = INIT_REQUEST_3_STATE;
3064 foriq->wait_priming_stub = 0;
3065 } else foriq->state = INIT_REQUEST_2_STATE;
3066 /* because we are finished, the parent will be reactivated */
3067}
3068
3069/**
3070 * This handles the response to a priming query. This is used to handle both
3071 * root and stub priming responses. This is basically the equivalent of the
3072 * QUERY_RESP_STATE, but will not handle CNAME responses and will treat
3073 * REFERRALs as ANSWERS. It will also update and reactivate the originating
3074 * event.
3075 *
3076 * @param qstate: query state.
3077 * @param id: module id.
3078 * @return true if the event needs more immediate processing, false if not.
3079 * This state always returns false.
3080 */
3081static int
3082processPrimeResponse(struct module_qstate* qstate, int id)
3083{
3084 struct iter_qstate* iq = (struct iter_qstate*)qstate->minfo[id];
3085 enum response_type type;
3086 iq->response->rep->flags &= ~(BIT_RD|BIT_RA); /* ignore rec-lame */
3087 type = response_type_from_server(
3088 (int)((iq->chase_flags&BIT_RD) || iq->chase_to_rd),
3089 iq->response, &iq->qchase, iq->dp);
3090 if(type == RESPONSE_TYPE_ANSWER) {
3091 qstate->return_rcode = LDNS_RCODE_NOERROR;
3092 qstate->return_msg = iq->response;
3093 } else {
3094 errinf(qstate, "prime response did not get an answer");
3095 errinf_dname(qstate, "for", qstate->qinfo.qname);
3096 qstate->return_rcode = LDNS_RCODE_SERVFAIL;
3097 qstate->return_msg = NULL;
3098 }
3099
3100 /* validate the root or stub after priming (if enabled).
3101 * This is the same query as the prime query, but with validation.
3102 * Now that we are primed, the additional queries that validation
3103 * may need can be resolved, such as DLV. */
3104 if(qstate->env->cfg->harden_referral_path) {
3105 struct module_qstate* subq = NULL;
3106 log_nametypeclass(VERB_ALGO, "schedule prime validation",
3107 qstate->qinfo.qname, qstate->qinfo.qtype,
3108 qstate->qinfo.qclass);
3109 if(!generate_sub_request(qstate->qinfo.qname,
3110 qstate->qinfo.qname_len, qstate->qinfo.qtype,
3111 qstate->qinfo.qclass, qstate, id, iq,
3112 INIT_REQUEST_STATE, FINISHED_STATE, &subq, 1)) {
3113 verbose(VERB_ALGO, "could not generate prime check");
3114 }
3115 generate_a_aaaa_check(qstate, iq, id);
3116 }
3117
3118 /* This event is finished. */
3119 qstate->ext_state[id] = module_finished;
3120 return 0;
3121}
3122
3123/**
3124 * Do final processing on responses to target queries. Events reach this
3125 * state after the iterative resolution algorithm terminates. This state is
3126 * responsible for reactivating the original event, and housekeeping related
3127 * to received target responses (caching, updating the current delegation
3128 * point, etc).
3129 * Callback from walk_supers for every super state that is interested in
3130 * the results from this query.
3131 *
3132 * @param qstate: query state.
3133 * @param id: module id.
3134 * @param forq: super query state.
3135 */
3136static void
3137processTargetResponse(struct module_qstate* qstate, int id,
3138 struct module_qstate* forq)
3139{
3140 struct iter_qstate* iq = (struct iter_qstate*)qstate->minfo[id];
3141 struct iter_qstate* foriq = (struct iter_qstate*)forq->minfo[id];
3142 struct ub_packed_rrset_key* rrset;
3143 struct delegpt_ns* dpns;
3144 log_assert(qstate->return_rcode == LDNS_RCODE_NOERROR);
3145
3146 foriq->state = QUERYTARGETS_STATE;
3147 log_query_info(VERB_ALGO, "processTargetResponse", &qstate->qinfo);
3148 log_query_info(VERB_ALGO, "processTargetResponse super", &forq->qinfo);
3149
3150 /* Tell the originating event that this target query has finished
3151 * (regardless if it succeeded or not). */
3152 foriq->num_target_queries--;
3153
3154 /* check to see if parent event is still interested (in orig name). */
3155 if(!foriq->dp) {
3156 verbose(VERB_ALGO, "subq: parent not interested, was reset");
3157 return; /* not interested anymore */
3158 }
3159 dpns = delegpt_find_ns(foriq->dp, qstate->qinfo.qname,
3160 qstate->qinfo.qname_len);
3161 if(!dpns) {
3162 /* If not interested, just stop processing this event */
3163 verbose(VERB_ALGO, "subq: parent not interested anymore");
3164 /* could be because parent was jostled out of the cache,
3165 and a new identical query arrived, that does not want it*/
3166 return;
3167 }
3168
3169 /* if iq->query_for_pside_glue then add the pside_glue (marked lame) */
3170 if(iq->pside_glue) {
3171 /* if the pside_glue is NULL, then it could not be found,
3172 * the done_pside is already set when created and a cache
3173 * entry created in processFinished so nothing to do here */
3174 log_rrset_key(VERB_ALGO, "add parentside glue to dp",
3175 iq->pside_glue);
3176 if(!delegpt_add_rrset(foriq->dp, forq->region,
3177 iq->pside_glue, 1))
3178 log_err("out of memory adding pside glue");
3179 }
3180
3181 /* This response is relevant to the current query, so we
3182 * add (attempt to add, anyway) this target(s) and reactivate
3183 * the original event.
3184 * NOTE: we could only look for the AnswerRRset if the
3185 * response type was ANSWER. */
3186 rrset = reply_find_answer_rrset(&iq->qchase, qstate->return_msg->rep);
3187 if(rrset) {
3188 /* if CNAMEs have been followed - add new NS to delegpt. */
3189 /* BTW. RFC 1918 says NS should not have got CNAMEs. Robust. */
3190 if(!delegpt_find_ns(foriq->dp, rrset->rk.dname,
3191 rrset->rk.dname_len)) {
3192 /* if dpns->lame then set newcname ns lame too */
3193 if(!delegpt_add_ns(foriq->dp, forq->region,
3194 rrset->rk.dname, dpns->lame))
3195 log_err("out of memory adding cnamed-ns");
3196 }
3197 /* if dpns->lame then set the address(es) lame too */
3198 if(!delegpt_add_rrset(foriq->dp, forq->region, rrset,
3199 dpns->lame))
3200 log_err("out of memory adding targets");
3201 verbose(VERB_ALGO, "added target response");
3202 delegpt_log(VERB_ALGO, foriq->dp);
3203 } else {
3204 verbose(VERB_ALGO, "iterator TargetResponse failed");
3205 dpns->resolved = 1; /* fail the target */
3206 }
3207}
3208
3209/**
3210 * Process response for DS NS Find queries, that attempt to find the delegation
3211 * point where we ask the DS query from.
3212 *
3213 * @param qstate: query state.
3214 * @param id: module id.
3215 * @param forq: super query state.
3216 */
3217static void
3218processDSNSResponse(struct module_qstate* qstate, int id,
3219 struct module_qstate* forq)
3220{
3221 struct iter_qstate* foriq = (struct iter_qstate*)forq->minfo[id];
3222
3223 /* if the finished (iq->response) query has no NS set: continue
3224 * up to look for the right dp; nothing to change, do DPNSstate */
3225 if(qstate->return_rcode != LDNS_RCODE_NOERROR)
3226 return; /* seek further */
3227 /* find the NS RRset (without allowing CNAMEs) */
3228 if(!reply_find_rrset(qstate->return_msg->rep, qstate->qinfo.qname,
3229 qstate->qinfo.qname_len, LDNS_RR_TYPE_NS,
3230 qstate->qinfo.qclass)){
3231 return; /* seek further */
3232 }
3233
3234 /* else, store as DP and continue at querytargets */
3235 foriq->state = QUERYTARGETS_STATE;
3236 foriq->dp = delegpt_from_message(qstate->return_msg, forq->region);
3237 if(!foriq->dp) {
3238 log_err("out of memory in dsns dp alloc");
3239 errinf(qstate, "malloc failure, in DS search");
3240 return; /* dp==NULL in QUERYTARGETS makes SERVFAIL */
3241 }
3242 /* success, go query the querytargets in the new dp (and go down) */
3243}
3244
3245/**
3246 * Process response for qclass=ANY queries for a particular class.
3247 * Append to result or error-exit.
3248 *
3249 * @param qstate: query state.
3250 * @param id: module id.
3251 * @param forq: super query state.
3252 */
3253static void
3254processClassResponse(struct module_qstate* qstate, int id,
3255 struct module_qstate* forq)
3256{
3257 struct iter_qstate* foriq = (struct iter_qstate*)forq->minfo[id];
3258 struct dns_msg* from = qstate->return_msg;
3259 log_query_info(VERB_ALGO, "processClassResponse", &qstate->qinfo);
3260 log_query_info(VERB_ALGO, "processClassResponse super", &forq->qinfo);
3261 if(qstate->return_rcode != LDNS_RCODE_NOERROR) {
3262 /* cause servfail for qclass ANY query */
3263 foriq->response = NULL;
3264 foriq->state = FINISHED_STATE;
3265 return;
3266 }
3267 /* append result */
3268 if(!foriq->response) {
3269 /* allocate the response: copy RCODE, sec_state */
3270 foriq->response = dns_copy_msg(from, forq->region);
3271 if(!foriq->response) {
3272 log_err("malloc failed for qclass ANY response");
3273 foriq->state = FINISHED_STATE;
3274 return;
3275 }
3276 foriq->response->qinfo.qclass = forq->qinfo.qclass;
3277 /* qclass ANY does not receive the AA flag on replies */
3278 foriq->response->rep->authoritative = 0;
3279 } else {
3280 struct dns_msg* to = foriq->response;
3281 /* add _from_ this response _to_ existing collection */
3282 /* if there are records, copy RCODE */
3283 /* lower sec_state if this message is lower */
3284 if(from->rep->rrset_count != 0) {
3285 size_t n = from->rep->rrset_count+to->rep->rrset_count;
3286 struct ub_packed_rrset_key** dest, **d;
3287 /* copy appropriate rcode */
3288 to->rep->flags = from->rep->flags;
3289 /* copy rrsets */
3290 if(from->rep->rrset_count > RR_COUNT_MAX ||
3291 to->rep->rrset_count > RR_COUNT_MAX) {
3292 log_err("malloc failed (too many rrsets) in collect ANY");
3293 foriq->state = FINISHED_STATE;
3294 return; /* integer overflow protection */
3295 }
3296 dest = regional_alloc(forq->region, sizeof(dest[0])*n);
3297 if(!dest) {
3298 log_err("malloc failed in collect ANY");
3299 foriq->state = FINISHED_STATE;
3300 return;
3301 }
3302 d = dest;
3303 /* copy AN */
3304 memcpy(dest, to->rep->rrsets, to->rep->an_numrrsets
3305 * sizeof(dest[0]));
3306 dest += to->rep->an_numrrsets;
3307 memcpy(dest, from->rep->rrsets, from->rep->an_numrrsets
3308 * sizeof(dest[0]));
3309 dest += from->rep->an_numrrsets;
3310 /* copy NS */
3311 memcpy(dest, to->rep->rrsets+to->rep->an_numrrsets,
3312 to->rep->ns_numrrsets * sizeof(dest[0]));
3313 dest += to->rep->ns_numrrsets;
3314 memcpy(dest, from->rep->rrsets+from->rep->an_numrrsets,
3315 from->rep->ns_numrrsets * sizeof(dest[0]));
3316 dest += from->rep->ns_numrrsets;
3317 /* copy AR */
3318 memcpy(dest, to->rep->rrsets+to->rep->an_numrrsets+
3319 to->rep->ns_numrrsets,
3320 to->rep->ar_numrrsets * sizeof(dest[0]));
3321 dest += to->rep->ar_numrrsets;
3322 memcpy(dest, from->rep->rrsets+from->rep->an_numrrsets+
3323 from->rep->ns_numrrsets,
3324 from->rep->ar_numrrsets * sizeof(dest[0]));
3325 /* update counts */
3326 to->rep->rrsets = d;
3327 to->rep->an_numrrsets += from->rep->an_numrrsets;
3328 to->rep->ns_numrrsets += from->rep->ns_numrrsets;
3329 to->rep->ar_numrrsets += from->rep->ar_numrrsets;
3330 to->rep->rrset_count = n;
3331 }
3332 if(from->rep->security < to->rep->security) /* lowest sec */
3333 to->rep->security = from->rep->security;
3334 if(from->rep->qdcount != 0) /* insert qd if appropriate */
3335 to->rep->qdcount = from->rep->qdcount;
3336 if(from->rep->ttl < to->rep->ttl) /* use smallest TTL */
3337 to->rep->ttl = from->rep->ttl;
3338 if(from->rep->prefetch_ttl < to->rep->prefetch_ttl)
3339 to->rep->prefetch_ttl = from->rep->prefetch_ttl;
3340 if(from->rep->serve_expired_ttl < to->rep->serve_expired_ttl)
3341 to->rep->serve_expired_ttl = from->rep->serve_expired_ttl;
3342 }
3343 /* are we done? */
3344 foriq->num_current_queries --;
3345 if(foriq->num_current_queries == 0)
3346 foriq->state = FINISHED_STATE;
3347}
3348
3349/**
3350 * Collect class ANY responses and make them into one response. This
3351 * state is started and it creates queries for all classes (that have
3352 * root hints). The answers are then collected.
3353 *
3354 * @param qstate: query state.
3355 * @param id: module id.
3356 * @return true if the event needs more immediate processing, false if not.
3357 */
3358static int
3359processCollectClass(struct module_qstate* qstate, int id)
3360{
3361 struct iter_qstate* iq = (struct iter_qstate*)qstate->minfo[id];
3362 struct module_qstate* subq;
3363 /* If qchase.qclass == 0 then send out queries for all classes.
3364 * Otherwise, do nothing (wait for all answers to arrive and the
3365 * processClassResponse to put them together, and that moves us
3366 * towards the Finished state when done. */
3367 if(iq->qchase.qclass == 0) {
3368 uint16_t c = 0;
3369 iq->qchase.qclass = LDNS_RR_CLASS_ANY;
3370 while(iter_get_next_root(qstate->env->hints,
3371 qstate->env->fwds, &c)) {
3372 /* generate query for this class */
3373 log_nametypeclass(VERB_ALGO, "spawn collect query",
3374 qstate->qinfo.qname, qstate->qinfo.qtype, c);
3375 if(!generate_sub_request(qstate->qinfo.qname,
3376 qstate->qinfo.qname_len, qstate->qinfo.qtype,
3377 c, qstate, id, iq, INIT_REQUEST_STATE,
3378 FINISHED_STATE, &subq,
3379 (int)!(qstate->query_flags&BIT_CD))) {
3380 errinf(qstate, "could not generate class ANY"
3381 " lookup query");
3382 return error_response(qstate, id,
3383 LDNS_RCODE_SERVFAIL);
3384 }
3385 /* ignore subq, no special init required */
3386 iq->num_current_queries ++;
3387 if(c == 0xffff)
3388 break;
3389 else c++;
3390 }
3391 /* if no roots are configured at all, return */
3392 if(iq->num_current_queries == 0) {
3393 verbose(VERB_ALGO, "No root hints or fwds, giving up "
3394 "on qclass ANY");
3395 return error_response(qstate, id, LDNS_RCODE_REFUSED);
3396 }
3397 /* return false, wait for queries to return */
3398 }
3399 /* if woke up here because of an answer, wait for more answers */
3400 return 0;
3401}
3402
3403/**
3404 * This handles the final state for first-tier responses (i.e., responses to
3405 * externally generated queries).
3406 *
3407 * @param qstate: query state.
3408 * @param iq: iterator query state.
3409 * @param id: module id.
3410 * @return true if the event needs more processing, false if not. Since this
3411 * is the final state for an event, it always returns false.
3412 */
3413static int
3414processFinished(struct module_qstate* qstate, struct iter_qstate* iq,
3415 int id)
3416{
3417 log_query_info(VERB_QUERY, "finishing processing for",
3418 &qstate->qinfo);
3419
3420 /* store negative cache element for parent side glue. */
3421 if(!qstate->no_cache_store && iq->query_for_pside_glue
3422 && !iq->pside_glue)
3423 iter_store_parentside_neg(qstate->env, &qstate->qinfo,
3424 iq->deleg_msg?iq->deleg_msg->rep:
3425 (iq->response?iq->response->rep:NULL));
3426 if(!iq->response) {
3427 verbose(VERB_ALGO, "No response is set, servfail");
3428 errinf(qstate, "(no response found at query finish)");
3429 return error_response(qstate, id, LDNS_RCODE_SERVFAIL);
3430 }
3431
3432 /* Make sure that the RA flag is set (since the presence of
3433 * this module means that recursion is available) */
3434 iq->response->rep->flags |= BIT_RA;
3435
3436 /* Clear the AA flag */
3437 /* FIXME: does this action go here or in some other module? */
3438 iq->response->rep->flags &= ~BIT_AA;
3439
3440 /* make sure QR flag is on */
3441 iq->response->rep->flags |= BIT_QR;
3442
3443 /* we have finished processing this query */
3444 qstate->ext_state[id] = module_finished;
3445
3446 /* TODO: we are using a private TTL, trim the response. */
3447 /* if (mPrivateTTL > 0){IterUtils.setPrivateTTL(resp, mPrivateTTL); } */
3448
3449 /* prepend any items we have accumulated */
3450 if(iq->an_prepend_list || iq->ns_prepend_list) {
3451 if(!iter_prepend(iq, iq->response, qstate->region)) {
3452 log_err("prepend rrsets: out of memory");
3453 return error_response(qstate, id, LDNS_RCODE_SERVFAIL);
3454 }
3455 /* reset the query name back */
3456 iq->response->qinfo = qstate->qinfo;
3457 /* the security state depends on the combination */
3458 iq->response->rep->security = sec_status_unchecked;
3459 /* store message with the finished prepended items,
3460 * but only if we did recursion. The nonrecursion referral
3461 * from cache does not need to be stored in the msg cache. */
3462 if(!qstate->no_cache_store && qstate->query_flags&BIT_RD) {
3463 iter_dns_store(qstate->env, &qstate->qinfo,
3464 iq->response->rep, 0, qstate->prefetch_leeway,
3465 iq->dp&&iq->dp->has_parent_side_NS,
3466 qstate->region, qstate->query_flags);
3467 }
3468 }
3469 qstate->return_rcode = LDNS_RCODE_NOERROR;
3470 qstate->return_msg = iq->response;
3471 return 0;
3472}
3473
3474/*
3475 * Return priming query results to interested super querystates.
3476 *
3477 * Sets the delegation point and delegation message (not nonRD queries).
3478 * This is a callback from walk_supers.
3479 *
3480 * @param qstate: query state that finished.
3481 * @param id: module id.
3482 * @param super: the qstate to inform.
3483 */
3484void
3485iter_inform_super(struct module_qstate* qstate, int id,
3486 struct module_qstate* super)
3487{
3488 if(!qstate->is_priming && super->qinfo.qclass == LDNS_RR_CLASS_ANY)
3489 processClassResponse(qstate, id, super);
3490 else if(super->qinfo.qtype == LDNS_RR_TYPE_DS && ((struct iter_qstate*)
3491 super->minfo[id])->state == DSNS_FIND_STATE)
3492 processDSNSResponse(qstate, id, super);
3493 else if(qstate->return_rcode != LDNS_RCODE_NOERROR)
3494 error_supers(qstate, id, super);
3495 else if(qstate->is_priming)
3496 prime_supers(qstate, id, super);
3497 else processTargetResponse(qstate, id, super);
3498}
3499
3500/**
3501 * Handle iterator state.
3502 * Handle events. This is the real processing loop for events, responsible
3503 * for moving events through the various states. If a processing method
3504 * returns true, then it will be advanced to the next state. If false, then
3505 * processing will stop.
3506 *
3507 * @param qstate: query state.
3508 * @param ie: iterator shared global environment.
3509 * @param iq: iterator query state.
3510 * @param id: module id.
3511 */
3512static void
3513iter_handle(struct module_qstate* qstate, struct iter_qstate* iq,
3514 struct iter_env* ie, int id)
3515{
3516 int cont = 1;
3517 while(cont) {
3518 verbose(VERB_ALGO, "iter_handle processing q with state %s",
3519 iter_state_to_string(iq->state));
3520 switch(iq->state) {
3521 case INIT_REQUEST_STATE:
3522 cont = processInitRequest(qstate, iq, ie, id);
3523 break;
3524 case INIT_REQUEST_2_STATE:
3525 cont = processInitRequest2(qstate, iq, id);
3526 break;
3527 case INIT_REQUEST_3_STATE:
3528 cont = processInitRequest3(qstate, iq, id);
3529 break;
3530 case QUERYTARGETS_STATE:
3531 cont = processQueryTargets(qstate, iq, ie, id);
3532 break;
3533 case QUERY_RESP_STATE:
3534 cont = processQueryResponse(qstate, iq, id);
3535 break;
3536 case PRIME_RESP_STATE:
3537 cont = processPrimeResponse(qstate, id);
3538 break;
3539 case COLLECT_CLASS_STATE:
3540 cont = processCollectClass(qstate, id);
3541 break;
3542 case DSNS_FIND_STATE:
3543 cont = processDSNSFind(qstate, iq, id);
3544 break;
3545 case FINISHED_STATE:
3546 cont = processFinished(qstate, iq, id);
3547 break;
3548 default:
3549 log_warn("iterator: invalid state: %d",
3550 iq->state);
3551 cont = 0;
3552 break;
3553 }
3554 }
3555}
3556
3557/**
3558 * This is the primary entry point for processing request events. Note that
3559 * this method should only be used by external modules.
3560 * @param qstate: query state.
3561 * @param ie: iterator shared global environment.
3562 * @param iq: iterator query state.
3563 * @param id: module id.
3564 */
3565static void
3566process_request(struct module_qstate* qstate, struct iter_qstate* iq,
3567 struct iter_env* ie, int id)
3568{
3569 /* external requests start in the INIT state, and finish using the
3570 * FINISHED state. */
3571 iq->state = INIT_REQUEST_STATE;
3572 iq->final_state = FINISHED_STATE;
3573 verbose(VERB_ALGO, "process_request: new external request event");
3574 iter_handle(qstate, iq, ie, id);
3575}
3576
3577/** process authoritative server reply */
3578static void
3579process_response(struct module_qstate* qstate, struct iter_qstate* iq,
3580 struct iter_env* ie, int id, struct outbound_entry* outbound,
3581 enum module_ev event)
3582{
3583 struct msg_parse* prs;
3584 struct edns_data edns;
3585 sldns_buffer* pkt;
3586
3587 verbose(VERB_ALGO, "process_response: new external response event");
3588 iq->response = NULL;
3589 iq->state = QUERY_RESP_STATE;
3590 if(event == module_event_noreply || event == module_event_error) {
3591 if(event == module_event_noreply && iq->sent_count >= 3 &&
3592 qstate->env->cfg->use_caps_bits_for_id &&
3593 !iq->caps_fallback && !is_caps_whitelisted(ie, iq)) {
3594 /* start fallback */
3595 iq->caps_fallback = 1;
3596 iq->caps_server = 0;
3597 iq->caps_reply = NULL;
3598 iq->caps_response = NULL;
3599 iq->caps_minimisation_state = DONOT_MINIMISE_STATE;
3600 iq->state = QUERYTARGETS_STATE;
3601 iq->num_current_queries--;
3602 /* need fresh attempts for the 0x20 fallback, if
3603 * that was the cause for the failure */
3604 iter_dec_attempts(iq->dp, 3);
3605 verbose(VERB_DETAIL, "Capsforid: timeouts, starting fallback");
3606 goto handle_it;
3607 }
3608 goto handle_it;
3609 }
3610 if( (event != module_event_reply && event != module_event_capsfail)
3611 || !qstate->reply) {
3612 log_err("Bad event combined with response");
3613 outbound_list_remove(&iq->outlist, outbound);
3614 errinf(qstate, "module iterator received wrong internal event with a response message");
3615 (void)error_response(qstate, id, LDNS_RCODE_SERVFAIL);
3616 return;
3617 }
3618
3619 /* parse message */
3620 prs = (struct msg_parse*)regional_alloc(qstate->env->scratch,
3621 sizeof(struct msg_parse));
3622 if(!prs) {
3623 log_err("out of memory on incoming message");
3624 /* like packet got dropped */
3625 goto handle_it;
3626 }
3627 memset(prs, 0, sizeof(*prs));
3628 memset(&edns, 0, sizeof(edns));
3629 pkt = qstate->reply->c->buffer;
3630 sldns_buffer_set_position(pkt, 0);
3631 if(parse_packet(pkt, prs, qstate->env->scratch) != LDNS_RCODE_NOERROR) {
3632 verbose(VERB_ALGO, "parse error on reply packet");
3633 goto handle_it;
3634 }
3635 /* edns is not examined, but removed from message to help cache */
3636 if(parse_extract_edns(prs, &edns, qstate->env->scratch) !=
3637 LDNS_RCODE_NOERROR)
3638 goto handle_it;
3639
3640 /* Copy the edns options we may got from the back end */
3641 if(edns.opt_list) {
3642 qstate->edns_opts_back_in = edns_opt_copy_region(edns.opt_list,
3643 qstate->region);
3644 if(!qstate->edns_opts_back_in) {
3645 log_err("out of memory on incoming message");
3646 /* like packet got dropped */
3647 goto handle_it;
3648 }
3649 if(!inplace_cb_edns_back_parsed_call(qstate->env, qstate)) {
3650 log_err("unable to call edns_back_parsed callback");
3651 goto handle_it;
3652 }
3653 }
3654
3655 /* remove CD-bit, we asked for in case we handle validation ourself */
3656 prs->flags &= ~BIT_CD;
3657
3658 /* normalize and sanitize: easy to delete items from linked lists */
3659 if(!scrub_message(pkt, prs, &iq->qinfo_out, iq->dp->name,
3660 qstate->env->scratch, qstate->env, ie)) {
3661 /* if 0x20 enabled, start fallback, but we have no message */
3662 if(event == module_event_capsfail && !iq->caps_fallback) {
3663 iq->caps_fallback = 1;
3664 iq->caps_server = 0;
3665 iq->caps_reply = NULL;
3666 iq->caps_response = NULL;
3667 iq->caps_minimisation_state = DONOT_MINIMISE_STATE;
3668 iq->state = QUERYTARGETS_STATE;
3669 iq->num_current_queries--;
3670 verbose(VERB_DETAIL, "Capsforid: scrub failed, starting fallback with no response");
3671 }
3672 goto handle_it;
3673 }
3674
3675 /* allocate response dns_msg in region */
3676 iq->response = dns_alloc_msg(pkt, prs, qstate->region);
3677 if(!iq->response)
3678 goto handle_it;
3679 log_query_info(VERB_DETAIL, "response for", &qstate->qinfo);
3680 log_name_addr(VERB_DETAIL, "reply from", iq->dp->name,
3681 &qstate->reply->addr, qstate->reply->addrlen);
3682 if(verbosity >= VERB_ALGO)
3683 log_dns_msg("incoming scrubbed packet:", &iq->response->qinfo,
3684 iq->response->rep);
3685
3686 if(event == module_event_capsfail || iq->caps_fallback) {
3687 if(qstate->env->cfg->qname_minimisation &&
3688 iq->minimisation_state != DONOT_MINIMISE_STATE) {
3689 /* Skip QNAME minimisation for next query, since that
3690 * one has to match the current query. */
3691 iq->minimisation_state = SKIP_MINIMISE_STATE;
3692 }
3693 /* for fallback we care about main answer, not additionals */
3694 /* removing that makes comparison more likely to succeed */
3695 caps_strip_reply(iq->response->rep);
3696
3697 if(iq->caps_fallback &&
3698 iq->caps_minimisation_state != iq->minimisation_state) {
3699 /* QNAME minimisation state has changed, restart caps
3700 * fallback. */
3701 iq->caps_fallback = 0;
3702 }
3703
3704 if(!iq->caps_fallback) {
3705 /* start fallback */
3706 iq->caps_fallback = 1;
3707 iq->caps_server = 0;
3708 iq->caps_reply = iq->response->rep;
3709 iq->caps_response = iq->response;
3710 iq->caps_minimisation_state = iq->minimisation_state;
3711 iq->state = QUERYTARGETS_STATE;
3712 iq->num_current_queries--;
3713 verbose(VERB_DETAIL, "Capsforid: starting fallback");
3714 goto handle_it;
3715 } else {
3716 /* check if reply is the same, otherwise, fail */
3717 if(!iq->caps_reply) {
3718 iq->caps_reply = iq->response->rep;
3719 iq->caps_response = iq->response;
3720 iq->caps_server = -1; /*become zero at ++,
3721 so that we start the full set of trials */
3722 } else if(caps_failed_rcode(iq->caps_reply) &&
3723 !caps_failed_rcode(iq->response->rep)) {
3724 /* prefer to upgrade to non-SERVFAIL */
3725 iq->caps_reply = iq->response->rep;
3726 iq->caps_response = iq->response;
3727 } else if(!caps_failed_rcode(iq->caps_reply) &&
3728 caps_failed_rcode(iq->response->rep)) {
3729 /* if we have non-SERVFAIL as answer then
3730 * we can ignore SERVFAILs for the equality
3731 * comparison */
3732 /* no instructions here, skip other else */
3733 } else if(caps_failed_rcode(iq->caps_reply) &&
3734 caps_failed_rcode(iq->response->rep)) {
3735 /* failure is same as other failure in fallbk*/
3736 /* no instructions here, skip other else */
3737 } else if(!reply_equal(iq->response->rep, iq->caps_reply,
3738 qstate->env->scratch)) {
3739 verbose(VERB_DETAIL, "Capsforid fallback: "
3740 "getting different replies, failed");
3741 outbound_list_remove(&iq->outlist, outbound);
3742 errinf(qstate, "0x20 failed, then got different replies in fallback");
3743 (void)error_response(qstate, id,
3744 LDNS_RCODE_SERVFAIL);
3745 return;
3746 }
3747 /* continue the fallback procedure at next server */
3748 iq->caps_server++;
3749 iq->state = QUERYTARGETS_STATE;
3750 iq->num_current_queries--;
3751 verbose(VERB_DETAIL, "Capsforid: reply is equal. "
3752 "go to next fallback");
3753 goto handle_it;
3754 }
3755 }
3756 iq->caps_fallback = 0; /* if we were in fallback, 0x20 is OK now */
3757
3758handle_it:
3759 outbound_list_remove(&iq->outlist, outbound);
3760 iter_handle(qstate, iq, ie, id);
3761}
3762
3763void
3764iter_operate(struct module_qstate* qstate, enum module_ev event, int id,
3765 struct outbound_entry* outbound)
3766{
3767 struct iter_env* ie = (struct iter_env*)qstate->env->modinfo[id];
3768 struct iter_qstate* iq = (struct iter_qstate*)qstate->minfo[id];
3769 verbose(VERB_QUERY, "iterator[module %d] operate: extstate:%s event:%s",
3770 id, strextstate(qstate->ext_state[id]), strmodulevent(event));
3771 if(iq) log_query_info(VERB_QUERY, "iterator operate: query",
3772 &qstate->qinfo);
3773 if(iq && qstate->qinfo.qname != iq->qchase.qname)
3774 log_query_info(VERB_QUERY, "iterator operate: chased to",
3775 &iq->qchase);
3776
3777 /* perform iterator state machine */
3778 if((event == module_event_new || event == module_event_pass) &&
3779 iq == NULL) {
3780 if(!iter_new(qstate, id)) {
3781 errinf(qstate, "malloc failure, new iterator module allocation");
3782 (void)error_response(qstate, id, LDNS_RCODE_SERVFAIL);
3783 return;
3784 }
3785 iq = (struct iter_qstate*)qstate->minfo[id];
3786 process_request(qstate, iq, ie, id);
3787 return;
3788 }
3789 if(iq && event == module_event_pass) {
3790 iter_handle(qstate, iq, ie, id);
3791 return;
3792 }
3793 if(iq && outbound) {
3794 process_response(qstate, iq, ie, id, outbound, event);
3795 return;
3796 }
3797 if(event == module_event_error) {
3798 verbose(VERB_ALGO, "got called with event error, giving up");
3799 errinf(qstate, "iterator module got the error event");
3800 (void)error_response(qstate, id, LDNS_RCODE_SERVFAIL);
3801 return;
3802 }
3803
3804 log_err("bad event for iterator");
3805 errinf(qstate, "iterator module received wrong event");
3806 (void)error_response(qstate, id, LDNS_RCODE_SERVFAIL);
3807}
3808
3809void
3810iter_clear(struct module_qstate* qstate, int id)
3811{
3812 struct iter_qstate* iq;
3813 if(!qstate)
3814 return;
3815 iq = (struct iter_qstate*)qstate->minfo[id];
3816 if(iq) {
3817 outbound_list_clear(&iq->outlist);
3818 if(iq->target_count && --iq->target_count[0] == 0)
3819 free(iq->target_count);
3820 iq->num_current_queries = 0;
3821 }
3822 qstate->minfo[id] = NULL;
3823}
3824
3825size_t
3826iter_get_mem(struct module_env* env, int id)
3827{
3828 struct iter_env* ie = (struct iter_env*)env->modinfo[id];
3829 if(!ie)
3830 return 0;
3831 return sizeof(*ie) + sizeof(int)*((size_t)ie->max_dependency_depth+1)
3832 + donotq_get_mem(ie->donotq) + priv_get_mem(ie->priv);
3833}

3835/**
3836 * The iterator function block
3837 */
3838static struct module_func_block iter_block = {
3839 "iterator",
3840 &iter_init, &iter_deinit, &iter_operate, &iter_inform_super,
3841 &iter_clear, &iter_get_mem
3842};
3843
3844struct module_func_block*
3845iter_get_funcblock(void)
3846{
3847 return &iter_block;
3848}
3849
3850const char*
3851iter_state_to_string(enum iter_state state)
3852{
3853 switch (state)
3854 {
3855 case INIT_REQUEST_STATE :
3856 return "INIT REQUEST STATE";
3857 case INIT_REQUEST_2_STATE :
3858 return "INIT REQUEST STATE (stage 2)";
3859 case INIT_REQUEST_3_STATE:
3860 return "INIT REQUEST STATE (stage 3)";
3861 case QUERYTARGETS_STATE :
3862 return "QUERY TARGETS STATE";
3863 case PRIME_RESP_STATE :
3864 return "PRIME RESPONSE STATE";
3865 case COLLECT_CLASS_STATE :
3866 return "COLLECT CLASS STATE";
3867 case DSNS_FIND_STATE :
3868 return "DSNS FIND STATE";
3869 case QUERY_RESP_STATE :
3870 return "QUERY RESPONSE STATE";
3871 case FINISHED_STATE :
3872 return "FINISHED RESPONSE STATE";
3873 default :
3874 return "UNKNOWN ITER STATE";
3875 }
3876}
3877
3878int
3879iter_state_is_responsestate(enum iter_state s)
3880{
3881 switch(s) {
3882 case INIT_REQUEST_STATE :
3883 case INIT_REQUEST_2_STATE :
3884 case INIT_REQUEST_3_STATE :
3885 case QUERYTARGETS_STATE :
3886 case COLLECT_CLASS_STATE :
3887 return 0;
3888 default:
3889 break;
3890 }
3891 return 1;
3892}
